A soft-spoken woman is used to living in the shadow of her pop star boyfriend, but when he breaks up with her right before the holiday season, she returns to her hometown to discover the heart and music that her big city life has been missing.

Believing they've left behind the shadowy figures from the past, Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection -- until sinister events start to jeopardize their happy ending before it even begins.

George Clooney, Sofia Coppola, Tommy Lee Jones, Jeff Goldblum, Anjelica Huston, Wes Anderson, Lenny Kravitz, Naomi Campbell, Jon Hamm and other celebrities tell the untold stories of the Carlyle, New York's legendary and landmark hotel.

After snitching on the mob, a Mafia boss and his family enter the Witness Protection Program and relocate to a sleepy town in France, but their insistence on resorting to their old habits places them in danger from vengeful cronies.

John Alexander, un sicario contratado para asesinar a un narcotraficante afgano en Odessa, Ucrania, deja en segundo plano su misión para salvar a una chica que está siendo explotada por una mafia dedicada a la trata de personas.

One week before his wedding, an uptight lawyer finds himself driving his foulmouthed grandfather to Daytona Beach, Fla., for a wild spring break that includes frat parties, bar fights and an epic night of karaoke.

Lisa's trip home to Evergreen for the holidays finds her shepherding an effort to save the town's beloved general store, fulfilling the wishes of a Christmas past and finding a romance full of Christmas magic.

Una humana artificial auto-consciente queda atrapada en el fuego cruzado entre un policía y el creador de un exclusivo centro turístico donde los clientes pagan para realizar sus fantasías más salvajes.
Convinced that Superman is now a threat to humanity, Batman embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.
Michael takes a job as an exotic dancer to make ends meet, and as the money rolls in, he has to deal with the attention of the female club goers while hiding his job from his mother and girlfriend.
Cold War veteran Stan Hurley takes CIA black ops recruit Mitch Rapp under his wing, and they join forces with a lethal Turkish agent to stop a mysterious operative who wants to start a global war.
A businesswoman is sent to shut down one of her company's holdings, but instead of closing down the iconic firm, she unexpectedly falls in love and learns valuable lessons beyond the bottom line.
A cruel stepmother reduces her dead husband's only child to the role of scullery maid, but a kindly beggar woman and some helpful mice bring about a change in the young woman's fortunes.
When a devastating turn of events thrusts them into the middle of a dangerous plot, a child prodigy, his robot and their friends become high-tech heroes on a mission to save their city.
While trying to win the approval of her boyfriend's parents and the rest of his family, she only succeeds in highlighting her uptight personality, making Everett doubt his intentions.
An ex-con tries to pull away from a life of crime, but the temptation proves too strong, bringing his already-strained relationship with his policeman brother to the breaking point.
Shoshana Bush, Damon Wayans Jr. Two teens from opposite sides of the tracks come together through their passion for dancing and their desire to win the mother of all dance battles.
Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.
A brutal felon escapes from hell and, with police and a satanic henchman on his trail, sets out to avenge his daughter's murder and save his grandchild from bloodthirsty cultists.
Reincarnated as different dogs over the course of five decades, a lovable and devoted canine keeps reuniting with the original owner who cared for it as a golden retriever puppy.
A reluctant Christmas-tree seller finds renewed holiday spirit and new romance with a repeat customer, but a mean-spirited executive threatens to shut down her family's business.
After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

When Tony Stark's jumpstart of a dormant peacekeeping program goes awry, the Avengers must reassemble to battle a terrifying technological villain hell-bent on human extinction.
Several American youths volunteer for the French military before the U.S. enters World War I and later become a squadron of fighter pilots, the celebrated Lafayette Escadrille.

Chief electronics technician Mike Williams and other crew members fight for survival when the Deepwater Horizon drilling rig explodes on April 20, 2010, in the Gulf of Mexico.
Spirits of jilted lovers take a photographer on an odyssey through his many failed relationships to find out what made him such a cad, and if there is any hope for true love.

A couple battle a demonic presence in their new home, the location of many gruesome murders a year earlier.

Scientists find extraterrestrials and conspiracy after tracking strange radio signals to a Mexican village.

Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.
Musical outtakes and short subjects highlight this tale of an actor's ill-fated attempt to produce a movie.

When his wife kicks him out, a broke and boozing slouch tries to sell his possessions at a giant yard sale.

An inspired Iowa farmer builds a baseball field, then sees Shoeless Joe Jackson's ghost and other marvels.
Adopted as a baby by one of Santa's elves, a man leaves the workshop to search for his family in New York.

Memoirs tell a deceased woman's children of her four-day affair in 1965 with a photographer on assignment.
After a bad day at work, a frustrated reporter meets God, who endows him with divine powers for one week.

The only trouble is, she can't cook, sew, or do any of the other things for which her mother is known.

The unexpected arrival of a longtime suitor complicates a woman's budding relationship with a client.
With help from her mother and Mr. Kriss, Holly falls in love with the town, and Mike, all over again.
Mary wants to restore the dilapidated lodge where she spent the holidays with her family growing up.
When she starts falling in love with the factory's owner, the town's Christmas spirit overtakes her.
A real-estate developer embarks on a wild cross-country odyssey to get home in time for her wedding.
Two screenwriters in a rut write a hit Western starring a has-been and a commissary waitress's baby.
A pilot afraid to fly follows his stewardess ex-girlfriend and must take over for the poisoned crew.
U.S. lawyers defend Africans who revolted against their Spanish captors aboard a slave ship in 1839.
Al Capone recruits ``Machine Gun'' Jack McGurn to help protect his criminal empire in 1920s Chicago.
Mrs. Voorhees' son Jason is waiting when another load of teens tries to make a buck at Camp Crystal.
An aging pitcher learns that he will soon lose his girlfriend and his spot with the Detroit Tigers.
A drug dealer wants to leave his violent life behind and pursue his dream of becoming a rap artist.
The horrors of Vietnam affect three Pennsylvania steelworkers, lifelong friends who serve together.
An undercover police officer investigates a gang leader suspected of stealing electronic equipment.
Residents of a Colorado town become caught up in a longstanding war between two deadly alien races.
A publicist tries to convince the press that the feuding co-stars of a new movie are still in love.
A jumbo jet's midair crisis puts a stewardess in the cockpit until a pilot can board by helicopter.
But she is thrown for a loop when she bumps into an old flame from her days as a singer in college.
Facing mandatory retirement after 200 years, Santa Claus asks a television producer to replace him.
A veteran CIA agent transforms a street-wise punk into a spy in order to replace his murdered twin.
An overworked architect obtains a universal remote that allows him to control the world around him.

(2018) Three people compete in the 10-week New York's Daily News Golden Gloves tournament.
White House aides draft a down-to-earth double to impersonate the president, who has had a stroke.
A climatologist tries to locate his son after global warming leads to worldwide natural disasters.
Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love.
A police rookie loses her badge, gains a boyfriend and hunts a killer who uses a44-caliber Magnum.
A 16-year-old girl falls in love with a mysterious spirit who inhabits a different body every day.
A bull's peaceful existence comes crashing down when authorities return him to his former captors.
A New York policeman outwits foreign thugs holding his wife and others in a Los Angeles high-rise.
A former NSA operative aids the innocent victim of a politically motivated assassination cover-up.
A businessman embarks on a revenge-fueled vendetta after his daughter dies in a terrorist bombing.
A shaken trapeze artist turns cliff diver while working as a singer/lifeguard at a Mexican hotel.
As Laura dives into the renovations, she discovers that a former love is the star of the benefit.
Three trapped thieves must fight for their lives after breaking into the home of a blind veteran.
A young man infiltrates a fraternity after the serial killer Motherface murders his twin brother.
A homicide detective and an arson investigator track two European killers who film their murders.
An eccentric's arrival complicates the lives of a protective brother and his mentally ill sister.
Three flightless birds investigate the mysterious arrival of green pigs to their island paradise.
When Nick, the new store Santa Claus shows up, she experiences a little holiday magic of her own.
A struggling flower shop owner joins a holiday floral show in an effort to keep her store afloat.
Complications arise after a man writes a successful how-to book on ending romantic relationships.
A crippled World War II veteran stalks a contractor whose prison-camp betrayal caused a massacre.
Gomez, Morticia and their ghoulish household are prey to a scam involving long-lost Uncle Fester.
A man and a woman meet by chance, then collaborate to spy on their exes, who are live-in lovers.
Would-be rockers armed with squirt guns take a radio station hostage for not playing their demo.
Father and stepfather Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children.
Their heroic and courageous actions help to save the lives of more than 500 passengers on board.
Chaos strikes when a woman and her daughter get separated from their family during the holidays.
Santa Claus travels to Las Vegas when his wife goes there to help a little girl and her mother.
Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.
A singing cabby poses as a gondolier for a cheese company, then goes to Venice and becomes one.
A hip Detroit detective drives out to Los Angeles and shows local police how to catch a killer.
A trucker and a lawyer become trapped in a sorcerer's empire beneath San Francisco's Chinatown.
A hip detective from Detroit tracks a crime ring to a Los Angeles fun park called WonderWorld.
Fired from her job, a woman returns home to see her mother and attend a Christmas Eve wedding.
A con man escapes from prison in a Santa Claus suit and meets two children who believe in him.
A rich reporter tours outback Australia with a crocodile hunter, then brings him to Manhattan.
When the search begins for this year's holiday tree, Albert believes he has found his calling.
A clown fish embarks on a journey to find his son after losing him in the Great Barrier Reef.
Jessica is thrilled to be taking over the running of her New England town's Christmas parade.
A West Point cadet puts on a show with a general's daughter he once loved and lost in Hawaii.
A hip Chicago teen moves to a Midwestern town where, thanks to a pastor, dancing is outlawed.
Good and evil twins are reunited in Hong Kong as heirs to a fortune, experts in martial arts.
Friends naively believe that adding sex to their relationship will not lead to complications.
When her Aunt Jane invites Paula to her Nantucket home, she bonds with a charming inn owner.
